title: UFYB 179: QA: Relationships
itunes:title: QA: Relationships
description:
Do you tend to make rejection mean there’s something “wrong” with you? Have you ever wondered how to know when a relationship is “toxic”? Do you struggle with a partner who is more extroverted than you are? In today’s Listener Q&A episode, I’ll answer some of your most burning relationship questions and share the role thought work can play in common relationship issues.

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/179
content:encoded:
Do you tend to make rejection mean there’s something “wrong” with you? Have you ever wondered how to know when a relationship is “toxic”? itunes:subtitle: How to know when a relationship is toxic, and other answers to your frequently asked relationship questions.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
